page.title: 18CUSTOMS
page.content: There are few local customs but the people of the village are always ready and willing to take part in anything to raise money for a good cause. There are two traditional events that are held annually they are the Boat Race and the Carnival. {THE BOAT RACE This event is organised by the rugby club and takes place every Boxing Day morning. The competitors dress in fancy-dress and run in the river from one bridge to another and back, a distance of 300 meters. A collection is made and the money given to charity. {THE CARNIVAL This event takes place in the summer. It gives the village a chance to 'Let it's hair down'.
